thumb.title: ヌーソロジー虚時間宇宙 Blues １
thumb.description: 虚時間宇宙 (Kyo Jikan Uchuu) Blues[Verse 1]宇宙が回る、渦がうねるよUchuu ga mawaru, uzu ga uneru yoEvery spin I see, born from the void虚時間の中、持続が響くKyo jikan no naka, jizoku ga hibikuOh, this timeless hum, fillin’ up my soul[Chorus]虚時間宇宙, hear my pleaKyo jikan uchuu, sakebu koe回転の源は、そこにあるさKaiten no minamoto wa, soko ni aru sa目を覚ませよ、世界が壊れる前にMe o samase yo, sekai ga kowareru mae niYeah, this blues I sing, to save us all, please[Verse 2]思考が鈍り、ピントがズレるShikou ga niburi, pinto ga zureruLost in the haze, we’re slippin’ awayこのままじゃダメだ、崩れるだけさKono mama ja dame da, kuzureru dake saWorld’s fallin’ apart, in the night’s decay[Chorus]虚時間宇宙, hear my pleaKyo jikan uchuu, sakebu koe回転の源は、そこにあるさKaiten no minamoto wa, soko ni aru sa目を覚ませよ、世界が壊れる前にMe o samase yo, sekai ga kowareru mae niYeah, this blues I sing, to save us all, please[Bridge]ギターが唸り、星が泣いてるGuitar ga unari, hoshi ga naiteruStrings bend and wail, through cosmic dust持続の波に、耳を澄ませよJizoku no nami ni, mimi o sumase yoTune your mind right, it’s now or bust
